attributes.action: Promote the Choking Game Awareness Campaign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to promote the awareness of what is being called the choking game, its far from a game and its lethal. My son passed away sept 6th 09 playing this game, if i had the knowledge and the information i have now im sure he would still be wih us now. It is far from a game it can cause amoung other things seizures, brain damage and Death, the game is being played at schools and in the childrens homes and most parents no little or nothing about it, i would like the awareness campaign to be promoted in schools across the uk, for warned is protection, its to late for my son, dont let it be too late for others.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to promote the Choking Game Awareness Campaign..

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 


http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=TCGawareness


Her Majesty's Government
